data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - Graffiti Glow Skin
data.detailed_description:
Rebel with a cause? Get a load of the Graffiti Glow DLC Pack, featuring an unmissable weapon skin for those who want to get noticed. Usable across all gun models, get ready to spray those bullets at the opposition.

Featuring:
  • Graffiti Weapon Skin

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
